text: Van Gogh's Bedroom in Arles is an oil painting by Vincent van Gogh. It was painted in October 1888. It measures 72 × 90 cm (28.3 × 35.4 in). It hangs in the Van Gogh Museum in Amsterdam. Van Gogh completed three paintings on the subject. Category:Paintings by Vincent van Gogh Category:1880s paintings Category:Arles Category:1888 works
title: Van Gogh's Bedroom in Arles
